review: The tutorial is annoying and you can not skip it. It is easy to use even if no tutorial. As far as using amazon prime it is great. However it doesn't have capability to use the apps I wanted. I should have went with Google chromcast it had all the apps I would use like HBO go and crunchy roll. Had to spend more money buying an app to make it airplay from my device and it does the job.
author: Adrienne Gutierrez

review: Would be better if it could detect and connect to networks which require you to open a browser and log in to the network that way as is often found in hotels.  I bought this for using Netflix etc on hotel televisions so I didn't have to carry stuff to stream to the television from my laptop.  It wouldn't connect to the network though so it was pretty well useless for what I wanted to use it for. Maybe future updates will allow it to recognize and properly connect to the internet when that type of security is used on the network.
